knowledgeGraph.title: Pagosa Springs Medical Center
knowledgeGraph.description: Pagosa Springs Medical Center is a critical access hospital in Pagosa Springs, Colorado, in Archuleta County. The hospital has 11 beds. It is a Level IV trauma center.

attributes.Address: 95 S Pagosa Blvd, Pagosa Springs, CO 81147
